errors.title: SwissCovid guide
errors.unexpected: An unexpected error has occurred. Please retry.

intro.title: SwissCovid guide
intro.description: Answer all questions in the guide. You will then be referred to the responsible authority.

recommendation.title: Hotline ID:
recommendation.description: Please state the ID above when you call the hotline so that we are able to access your answers and save time.
recommendation.descriptionEmail: Please state the ID above in your email so that we are able to access your answers and save time.

summary.title: Summary of the information in the SwissCovid guide

recommendationCode.label: Hotline ID
recommendationCode.invalid: Hotline ID must be alphanumeric and 4 characters long
recommendationCode.notFound: No exchanges found for the given Hotline ID
recommendationCode.expired: Hotline ID expired: the screening is older than 24 hours

profile.title: Personal details
profile.description: Enter your gender, age and canton. Depending on the result, you will be shown the cantonal contact addresses relevant to you.

canton.label: Canton
canton.invalid: Please write the full name of your canton.

age.label: Age
age.invalid: You must enter an age between 0 and 120.

contactDate.label: Contact dates
contactDate.question: Do you want to share the above contact dates?
contactDate.description: In case a call to the hotline is necessary, this will allow our collaborators to help you faster.

hearingImpaired.title: Assistance for hearing impaired people
hearingImpaired.description: On behalf of the FOPH, Medgate supports hearing impaired people via email.
